page.title: 16RECREATION IN NE LEICS
page.content: Television is the main form of entertainment and relaxation. Few people belong to clubs or attend evening classes. Leicester is the main focus for entertainment for adults apart from local pubs and restaurants. Melton Mowbray and Oakham provide discos and sports facilities. Some people make use of a mobile library which calls fortnightly. Most families read the local newspapers i.e. Leicester Mercury and Melton Times and many families also take a daily paper e.g. Mail, Express, Telegraph. Organisations in the area include a flourishing Young Farmers group at Tilton, branches of the Womens Institute at Twyford, Tilton and Burrough. Church of England services are held at Lowesby and Twyford parish churches and Methodist services at Twyford Chapel.
